name: yassin/stripe-api
description: The "yassin/stripe-package" is a comprehensive PHP package designed to simplify integration with the Stripe payment gateway. It provides a set of intuitive methods for handling various Stripe functionalities such as creating tokens for credit card transactions, processing payments, and managing subscriptions. With its clean and well-documented codebase, this package streamlines the development process, allowing developers to seamlessly incorporate Stripe payments into their PHP applications. Whether you're building an e-commerce platform, a subscription-based service, or a donation system, this package offers the flexibility and reliability you need to manage online payments effectively.
